I often wondered about this too. IMHO it should only feature people playing KSP.

This is what is currently featured:

The Featured streamers are people who either stream on KSPTV, or are in the Media Group. We discussed a filter to only show people when they're playing KSP, but ultimately decided against it. The streamers featured do a lot for KSP, and I don't think it's that bad to also show their channels when they're playing different games. Their channels often feature KSP content after all.

Sorry KasperVld I fail to see the logic in showing featured streamers when they are NOT playing KSP. I think it muddies the water.
